column1: Advanced Health and Care Management (Value-Based) MSc
column5: Advanced Health and Care Management Course OverviewDo you want to play your part in shaping the future of health and social care? Do you want to drive and implement Value-Based systems; where health, social care, third sector and life science work hand-in-hand to create the best outcomes possible for patients and service users as well as the bottom line?
column7: Please visit our website for the Advanced Health and Care Management (Value-Based) course fee information.
